parameters.text:
=Extract action items from the following text and return a structured JSON array with the following keys:
- "task": The action item description.
- "assignee": The person responsible for the task.
- "client": pull from subject line after "Recap of your meeting with "
- "due_date": The due date in YYYY-MM-DD format (or null if none is found).
Ensure the JSON is structured as an array and only return the array.  {{ $json.text }} {{ $json.subject }}
